abilities.name: Lightning Orb
abilities.description: Deals 455 + 100% Magical damage to the target.

abilities.name: Thunder Shield
abilities.description: Places a shield on Raiden for 5 turns. At end of turn, it activates Raiden's passive twice and gives 15% Magical Shield.

abilities.name: Electric Shock
abilities.description: 80% chance to deal 100% Magical damage to each enemy. Has 15% chance to reduce Magical Shield by 15% for 4 turns on each hit.

abilities.name: Storm Circle
abilities.description: 80% chance to deal 1000 damage to each enemy and stun them for 1 turn.

passive.name: Zap
passive.description: Using an ability zaps a random enemy target, dealing 100% magical damage ignoring magical shield.
